summary.para: Describes details for the discard-resource operation.

remarks.para: This structure is used by the method.
If rectangles are supplied in this structure, the resource must have 2D subresources with all specified subresources the same dimension.

summary.para: The number of rectangles in the array that the pRects member specifies.
An array of D3D12_RECT structures for the rectangles in the resource to discard. If NULL, discards the entire resource.
Index of the first subresource in the resource to discard.
The number of subresources in the resource to discard.
